## ExpectInterface.stringMatching() method

Matches strings that conform to the provided pattern.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
stringMatching(pattern: RegExp): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pattern | RegExp | a regexp to test the matched values. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
